1.16.1.1.16.1-1.5.30: Config now appears in server config folder rather than the config folder. Fixed Curios Compatibility.
1.16.1.1.16.1-1.5.31: Added license field to mod.toml fixing crash with latest forge version

1.16.2.1.16.2-1.5.32:
Fixed pedestal GUI title appearing not correctly.
Removed creeper tnt as it was not balanced.
Revert the bug which would cause all plant items to despawn in a minute. 
Disabled fortune and blazing being allowed together.

1.16.4.1.16.4-1.5.36: Added Beehive tooltips and easier recipe for repeater and trapped chest.
1.16.4.1.16.4-1.5.39: Added configuration option for dynamite cool down and explosion power

1.16.5.1.16.5-1.5.40:
Rewrote homing enchantment logic to be less resource intensive.
Tnt ignition works even if tnt is placed before magma block.
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.5.42: When blazing and fortune are both present, fortune effect happens and then blazing effect.
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.5.43: Fixed the issue where hops cancels/reduces the momentum of the player when jumping.
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.5.44:
Disable gravity for homing arrow when it only targets an entity.
Add glowing effect to the entity homing bow is going to target.
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.5.45:
Homing no longer targets pets.
Fix not being able to dye signs due to sign editing feature.
1.16.5.1.16.5-1.5.46: Fix disabling enchantments not causing it to appear in librarians trades.
